attributes.additional_details:
I and my fellow petitioners call for the immediate sacking of David Cameron and his Cabinet, the dissolution of parliament and a General Election as soon as possible.

It is safe to say the majority of the citizens of The United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland do not support the current regime who have undoubtedly failed  to control the civil unrest and disobedience throughout the kingdom as well as watch the world economies crumble around them while they relaxed abroad in villas and classy restaurants.

So much for "we're all in this together".
